segments.text: Hilton hotel , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We would like to book a table for 6 at 7:00 in the evening .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , sir . We will arrange one for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can we bring drinks by ourselves ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , sir . It's not allowed in our hotel .
segments.speaker: S1
